name: Grandma's Creamy Ham Casserole
author: lwelsh
summary: One of my kid's favorite casseroles. Best recipe the day after a big ham supper!
ingredients: 1 (10.75 ounce) can  condensed cream of chicken soup
⅓ pound processed cheese food (such as Velveeta®), cubed
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil
Cook egg noodles in the boiling water, stirring occasionally, until cooked through but firm to the bite, about 5 minutes
Mix egg noodles, ham, evaporated milk, cream of chicken soup, onion, and processed cheese food in a 9x13-inch baking dish until evenly distributed
Bake in preheated oven until bubbly and cheese food is melted, about 1 hour
About 5 minutes before end of baking, sprinkle chips atop casserole and return to oven; bake for 5 minutes more
